## Executive Summary  


## Exploratory Data Analysis  

```{r}
data(mtcars)
?mtcars

summary(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am==0])
summary(mtcars$mpg[mtcars$am==1])
```   

## Regression Analysis  
First, we fit the full model as the following.  
```{r}
fullReg<-lm(mpg~.,data=mtcars)
summary(fullReg)
```  

```{r}
stepReg<-step(fullReg,k=log(nrow(mtcars)))
summary(stepReg)
```  



```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(amIntWtModel)
```  
